channel.title: [508] pvp random drops help
channel.description:
hey guys. im using CodeUSA. when i kill some one in pk all i get is bones each time sooo im guessing there is something wrong. im not sure if there is a random drop added or not so how would i check if it is? and if so how to i modify it?
SOZ im new to 508s
Thanks,
Brandon

item.title: [508] pvp random drops help
item.dc:creator: @skulledace22 skulledace22
item.description:
@skulledace22 wrote:

If i am right then u can fix this whit a brecket.
This i had whit pvp drops :[tt] int[] lostItems = allItems;
if (receivesPVPDrop(this, Server.engine.players[Server.engine.getIdFromName(opp)]))
PVPDrop(opp, lostItems);
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
System.out.println("Null drop: "+opp);
return;
}
}
[/tt]

I added brecket and got player item drops.
[tt] int[] lostItems = allItems;
if (isPVP() && receivesPVPDrop(this, Server.engine.players[Server.engine.getIdFromName(opp)])) {
PVPDrop(opp, lostItems);
}
} catch (Exception e) {
e.printStackTrace();
System.out.println("Null drop: "+opp);
return;
}
}
[/tt].

Read full topic
